snippet.title: Peglin Trailer - Friends & Foes Update!
snippet.description:
A trailer that introduces Peglin and shows off some of the upcoming content coming in the Friends & Foes update - releasing on PC and Mobile (for the first time!) on April 25th!

Find Peglin on Steam here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1296610/Peglin/

Or links to other platforms here:
https://peglin.com
